description: A princess deals with various adversaries as she moves into the role she chooses for herself, not the one chosen for her.
title: Shield of Sparrows
author: Devney Perry

description: A writer looking for her big break competes against a Pulitzer winner to tell the story of an octogenarian with a storied past.
title: Great Big Beautiful Life
author: Emily Henry

description: A young woman looks into the story behind a painting that was made 25 years ago and a small group of teens depicted in it; translated by Neil Smith.
title: My Friends
author: Fredrik Backman

description: Years after their sisters went missing in a similar way, Nicole Monroe and Jenna Connor team up to search for them.
title: The Missing Half
author: Ashley Flowers with Alex Kiester

description: Wren Darlington winds up in the elite training program of her enemy and finds it hard to resist their commanding officer, Cross Redden.
title: Silver Elite
author: Dani Francis

description: The 25th book in the Women’s Murder Club series. Lindsay Boxer’s former partner is the victim at a crime scene.
title: 25 Alive
author: James Patterson and Maxine Paetro

description: The third book in the Empyrean series. As enemies gain traction, Violet Sorrengail goes beyond the Aretian wards in search of allies.
title: Onyx Storm
author: Rebecca Yarros

description: Around the time of the disappearance of a woman who had a one-night stand with the attorney Sarah Morgan’s new husband, police reopen the investigation into the murder of her first husband’s mistress.
title: The Perfect Divorce
author: Jeneva Rose

description: A reimagining of “Adventures of Huckleberry Finn” shines a different light on Mark Twain's classic, revealing new facets of the character of Jim.
title: James
author: Percival Everett

description: Despite having a great date, Samantha asks a veterinarian to forget about her because her family is in crisis.
title: Say You'll Remember Me
author: Abby Jimenez

description: In London in 1944, two teenagers dealing with the dangers of World War II form an alliance with a bookshop owner.
title: Strangers in Time
author: David Baldacci

description: The second book in the Empyrean series. Violet Sorrengail’s next round of training under the new vice commandant might require her to betray the man she loves.
title: Iron Flame
author: Rebecca Yarros

description: Beth must confront her past when the man she once loved as a teenager returns to the village with his son.
title: Broken Country
author: Clare Leslie Hall

description: Three alternate and alternating versions of Cora’s and her son’s lives are spun over several decades.
title: The Names
author: Florence Knapp

description: A nurse follows her brother to serve during the Vietnam War and returns to a divided America.
title: The Women
author: Kristin Hannah
